nodes.text: Q2-B3KO, or Threekayo, was a feminine-programmed articulated holographic color separator. Originally a fifth-degree droid, she was mistakenly upgraded to first-degree status as a result of a requisition error. During the Clone Wars, Q2-B3KO created the propaganda poster Fighting for Your Independence, made in support of the Confederacy of Independent Systems' Droid Army. After the war came to an end Q2-B3KO was recruited by the Droid Gotra, an organization of repurposed battle droids discontented with the Galactic Empire for being cast aside after serving in the Clone Wars. As a member of the Droid Gotra, Q2-B3KO specialized in spreading messages of droid liberation.
Q2-B3KO was first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in 2016.
